blocks.content: Define the relation " ` x ` is infinitesimal with respect to ` y ` " for a structure ` w ` . (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 30-Jan-2018.)
blocks.origin:
axiom df-inftm(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3) {
  |- wceq(cinftm, cmpt(s0, universe, copab(s1, s2, wa(wa(wcel(cv(s1), cfv(cbs, cv(s0))), wcel(cv(s2), cfv(cbs, cv(s0)))), wa(wbr(cfv(c0g, cv(s0)), cfv(cplt, cv(s0)), cv(s1)), wral(s3, cn, wbr(co(cv(s3), cfv(cmg, cv(s0)), cv(s1)), cfv(cplt, cv(s0)), cv(s2))))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s3)
  -| diffss(s1, s3)
  -| diffss(s2, s3)
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
}
blocks.pretty:
axiom df-inftm(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3) {
  ‚ä¢ <<< =(s0 ‚àà ùïå ‚Ü¶ { < s1, s2 > |((s1 ‚àà(Base ` s0)‚àß s2 ‚àà(Base ` s0))‚àß((0 ` s0)[(lt ` s0)]s1 ‚àß ‚àÄ(s3 ‚àà ‚Ñï,(s3[(.g ` s0)]s1)[(lt ` s0)]s2)))})
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s3)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, s3)
  ‚ä£ d(s2, s3)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s2)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, s2)
}

blocks.name: df-archi
blocks.content: A structure said to be Archimedean if it has no infinitesimal elements. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 30-Jan-2018.)

blocks.name: inftmrel

thm inftmrel(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wss(cfv(cinftm, c0), cxp(c2, c2)))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c0))
} = {
  syl6eqss(cfv(cinftm, c0), cxp(c2, c2), copab(hs0, hs1, wa(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c2), wcel(cv(hs1), c2)), wa(wbr(cfv(c0g, c0), cfv(cplt, c0), cv(hs0)), wral(hs2, cn, wbr(co(cv(hs2), cfv(cmg, c0), cv(hs0)), cfv(cplt, c0), cv(hs1)))))), wcel(c0, c1))
  syl(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(cfv(cinftm, c0), copab(hs0, hs1, wa(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c2), wcel(cv(hs1), c2)), wa(wbr(cfv(c0g, c0), cfv(cplt, c0), cv(hs0)), wral(hs2, cn, wbr(co(cv(hs2), cfv(cmg, c0), cv(hs0)), cfv(cplt, c0), cv(hs1))))))), wcel(c0, universe))
  elex(c0, c1)
  fvmpt(hs3, c0, universe, cinftm, copab(hs0, hs1, wa(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c2), wcel(cv(hs1), c2)), wa(wbr(cfv(c0g, c0), cfv(cplt, c0), cv(hs0)), wral(hs2, cn, wbr(co(cv(hs2), cfv(cmg, c0), cv(hs0)), cfv(cplt, c0), cv(hs1)))))), copab(hs0, hs1, wa(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cbs, cv(hs3))), wcel(cv(hs1), cfv(cbs, cv(hs3)))), wa(wbr(cfv(c0g, cv(hs3)), cfv(cplt, cv(hs3)), cv(hs0)), wral(hs2, cn, wbr(co(cv(hs2), cfv(cmg, cv(hs3)), cv(hs0)), cfv(cplt, cv(hs3)), cv(hs1)))))))
  opabbidv(hs0, hs1, wceq(cv(hs3), c0), wa(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cbs, cv(hs3))), wcel(cv(hs1), cfv(cbs, cv(hs3)))), wa(wbr(cfv(c0g, cv(hs3)), cfv(cplt, cv(hs3)), cv(hs0)), wral(hs2, cn, wbr(co(cv(hs2), cfv(cmg, cv(hs3)), cv(hs0)), cfv(cplt, cv(hs3)), cv(hs1))))), wa(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c2), wcel(cv(hs1), c2)), wa(wbr(cfv(c0g, c0), cfv(cplt, c0), cv(hs0)), wral(hs2, cn, wbr(co(cv(hs2), cfv(cmg, c0), cv(hs0)), cfv(cplt, c0), cv(hs1))))))
  anbi12d(wceq(cv(hs3), c0), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cbs, cv(hs3))), wcel(cv(hs1), cfv(cbs, cv(hs3)))), wa(wbr(cfv(c0g, cv(hs3)), cfv(cplt, cv(hs3)), cv(hs0)), wral(hs2, cn, wbr(co(cv(hs2), cfv(cmg, cv(hs3)), cv(hs0)), cfv(cplt, cv(hs3)), cv(hs1)))), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c2), wcel(cv(hs1), c2)), wa(wbr(cfv(c0g, c0), cfv(cplt, c0), cv(hs0)), wral(hs2, cn, wbr(co(cv(hs2), cfv(cmg, c0), cv(hs0)), cfv(cplt, c0), cv(hs1)))))
  anbi12d(wceq(cv(hs3), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cbs, cv(hs3))), wcel(cv(hs1), cfv(cbs, cv(hs3))), wcel(cv(hs0), c2), wcel(cv(hs1), c2))
  eleq2d(cv(hs0), cfv(cbs, cv(hs3)), c2, wceq(cv(hs3), c0))
  eleq2d(cv(hs1), cfv(cbs, cv(hs3)), c2, wceq(cv(hs3), c0))
  syl6eqr(cfv(cbs, cv(hs3)), c2, cfv(cbs, c0), wceq(cv(hs3), c0))
  fveq2(cv(hs3), c0, cbs)
  anbi12d(wceq(cv(hs3), c0), wbr(cfv(c0g, cv(hs3)), cfv(cplt, cv(hs3)), cv(hs0)), wral(hs2, cn, wbr(co(cv(hs2), cfv(cmg, cv(hs3)), cv(hs0)), cfv(cplt, cv(hs3)), cv(hs1))), wbr(cfv(c0g, c0), cfv(cplt, c0), cv(hs0)), wral(hs2, cn, wbr(co(cv(hs2), cfv(cmg, c0), cv(hs0)), cfv(cplt, c0), cv(hs1))))
  breq123d(cfv(c0g, cv(hs3)), cfv(cplt, cv(hs3)), cv(hs0), cfv(c0g, c0), cfv(cplt, c0), cv(hs0), wceq(cv(hs3), c0))
  fveq2(cv(hs3), c0, c0g)
  eqidd(cv(hs0), wceq(cv(hs3), c0))
  ralbidv(hs2, cn, wceq(cv(hs3), c0), wbr(co(cv(hs2), cfv(cmg, cv(hs3)), cv(hs0)), cfv(cplt, cv(hs3)), cv(hs1)), wbr(co(cv(hs2), cfv(cmg, c0), cv(hs0)), cfv(cplt, c0), cv(hs1)))
  breq123d(co(cv(hs2), cfv(cmg, cv(hs3)), cv(hs0)), cfv(cplt, cv(hs3)), cv(hs1), co(cv(hs2), cfv(cmg, c0), cv(hs0)), cfv(cplt, c0), cv(hs1), wceq(cv(hs3), c0))
  oveqd(cv(hs2), cfv(cmg, cv(hs3)), cv(hs0), cfv(cmg, c0), wceq(cv(hs3), c0))
  fveq2(cv(hs3), c0, cmg)
  fveq2(cv(hs3), c0, cplt)
  eqidd(cv(hs1), wceq(cv(hs3), c0))
  df-inftm(hs3, hs0, hs1, hs2)
  ssexi(copab(hs0, hs1, wa(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c2), wcel(cv(hs1), c2)), wa(wbr(cfv(c0g, c0), cfv(cplt, c0), cv(hs0)), wral(hs2, cn, wbr(co(cv(hs2), cfv(cmg, c0), cv(hs0)), cfv(cplt, c0), cv(hs1)))))), cxp(c2, c2))
  xpex(c2, c2)
  fvexi(c2, cbs, c0)
  opabssxp(hs0, hs1, c2, c2, wa(wbr(cfv(c0g, c0), cfv(cplt, c0), cv(hs0)), wral(hs2, cn, wbr(co(cv(hs2), cfv(cmg, c0), cv(hs0)), cfv(cplt, c0), cv(hs1)))))
  diff.hs3.c(c0)
  diff.hs3.c(universe)
  diff.hs3.c(copab(hs0, hs1, wa(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c2), wcel(cv(hs1), c2)), wa(wbr(cfv(c0g, c0), cfv(cplt, c0), cv(hs0)), wral(hs2, cn, wbr(co(cv(hs2), cfv(cmg, c0), cv(hs0)), cfv(cplt, c0), cv(hs1)))))))
  diff.hs0.w(wceq(cv(hs3), c0))
  diff.hs1.w(wceq(cv(hs3), c0))
  diff.hs2.w(wceq(cv(hs3), c0))
  diff.hs3.s(hs2)
  diff.hs0.s(hs2)
  diff.hs1.s(hs2)
  diff.hs3.s(hs0)
  diff.hs3.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm inftmrel(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ‚ä¢ (c0 ‚àà c1 ‚Üí(<<< ` c0)‚äÜ(c2 √ó c2))
  ‚ä£ c2 =(Base ` c0)
} = {
  syl6eqss((<<< ` c0), (c2 √ó c2), { < hs0, hs1 > |((hs0 ‚àà c2 ‚àß hs1 ‚àà c2)‚àß((0 ` c0)[(lt ` c0)]hs0 ‚àß ‚àÄ(hs2 ‚àà ‚Ñï,(hs2[(.g ` c0)]hs0)[(lt ` c0)]hs1)))}, c0 ‚àà c1)
  syl(c0 ‚àà c1, (<<< ` c0)= { < hs0, hs1 > |((hs0 ‚àà c2 ‚àß hs1 ‚àà c2)‚àß((0 ` c0)[(lt ` c0)]hs0 ‚àß ‚àÄ(hs2 ‚àà ‚Ñï,(hs2[(.g ` c0)]hs0)[(lt ` c0)]hs1)))}, c0 ‚àà ùïå)
  elex(c0, c1)
  fvmpt(hs3, c0, universe, cinftm, { < hs0, hs1 > |((hs0 ‚àà c2 ‚àß hs1 ‚àà c2)‚àß((0 ` c0)[(lt ` c0)]hs0 ‚àß ‚àÄ(hs2 ‚àà ‚Ñï,(hs2[(.g ` c0)]hs0)[(lt ` c0)]hs1)))}, { < hs0, hs1 > |((hs0 ‚àà(Base ` hs3)‚àß hs1 ‚àà(Base ` hs3))‚àß((0 ` hs3)[(lt ` hs3)]hs0 ‚àß ‚àÄ(hs2 ‚àà ‚Ñï,(hs2[(.g ` hs3)]hs0)[(lt ` hs3)]hs1)))})
  opabbidv(hs0, hs1, hs3 = c0, ((hs0 ‚àà(Base ` hs3)‚àß hs1 ‚àà(Base ` hs3))‚àß((0 ` hs3)[(lt ` hs3)]hs0 ‚àß ‚àÄ(hs2 ‚àà ‚Ñï,(hs2[(.g ` hs3)]hs0)[(lt ` hs3)]hs1))), ((hs0 ‚àà c2 ‚àß hs1 ‚àà c2)‚àß((0 ` c0)[(lt ` c0)]hs0 ‚àß ‚àÄ(hs2 ‚àà ‚Ñï,(hs2[(.g ` c0)]hs0)[(lt ` c0)]hs1))))
  anbi12d(hs3 = c0, (hs0 ‚àà(Base ` hs3)‚àß hs1 ‚àà(Base ` hs3)), ((0 ` hs3)[(lt ` hs3)]hs0 ‚àß ‚àÄ(hs2 ‚àà ‚Ñï,(hs2[(.g ` hs3)]hs0)[(lt ` hs3)]hs1)), (hs0 ‚àà c2 ‚àß hs1 ‚àà c2), ((0 ` c0)[(lt ` c0)]hs0 ‚àß ‚àÄ(hs2 ‚àà ‚Ñï,(hs2[(.g ` c0)]hs0)[(lt ` c0)]hs1)))
  anbi12d(hs3 = c0, hs0 ‚àà(Base ` hs3), hs1 ‚àà(Base ` hs3), hs0 ‚àà c2, hs1 ‚àà c2)
  eleq2d(hs0, (Base ` hs3), c2, hs3 = c0)
  eleq2d(hs1, (Base ` hs3), c2, hs3 = c0)
  syl6eqr((Base ` hs3), c2, (Base ` c0), hs3 = c0)
  fveq2(hs3, c0, cbs)
  anbi12d(hs3 = c0, (0 ` hs3)[(lt ` hs3)]hs0, ‚àÄ(hs2 ‚àà ‚Ñï,(hs2[(.g ` hs3)]hs0)[(lt ` hs3)]hs1), (0 ` c0)[(lt ` c0)]hs0, ‚àÄ(hs2 ‚àà ‚Ñï,(hs2[(.g ` c0)]hs0)[(lt ` c0)]hs1))
  breq123d((0 ` hs3), (lt ` hs3), hs0, (0 ` c0), (lt ` c0), hs0, hs3 = c0)
  fveq2(hs3, c0, c0g)
  eqidd(hs0, hs3 = c0)
  ralbidv(hs2, cn, hs3 = c0, (hs2[(.g ` hs3)]hs0)[(lt ` hs3)]hs1, (hs2[(.g ` c0)]hs0)[(lt ` c0)]hs1)
  breq123d((hs2[(.g ` hs3)]hs0), (lt ` hs3), hs1, (hs2[(.g ` c0)]hs0), (lt ` c0), hs1, hs3 = c0)
  oveqd(hs2, (.g ` hs3), hs0, (.g ` c0), hs3 = c0)
  fveq2(hs3, c0, cmg)
  fveq2(hs3, c0, cplt)
  eqidd(hs1, hs3 = c0)
  df-inftm(hs3, hs0, hs1, hs2)
  ssexi({ < hs0, hs1 > |((hs0 ‚àà c2 ‚àß hs1 ‚àà c2)‚àß((0 ` c0)[(lt ` c0)]hs0 ‚àß ‚àÄ(hs2 ‚àà ‚Ñï,(hs2[(.g ` c0)]hs0)[(lt ` c0)]hs1)))}, (c2 √ó c2))
  xpex(c2, c2)
  fvexi(c2, cbs, c0)
  opabssxp(hs0, hs1, c2, c2, ((0 ` c0)[(lt ` c0)]hs0 ‚àß ‚àÄ(hs2 ‚àà ‚Ñï,(hs2[(.g ` c0)]hs0)[(lt ` c0)]hs1)))
  diff.hs3.c(c0)
  diff.hs3.c(universe)
  diff.hs3.c({ < hs0, hs1 > |((hs0 ‚àà c2 ‚àß hs1 ‚àà c2)‚àß((0 ` c0)[(lt ` c0)]hs0 ‚àß ‚àÄ(hs2 ‚àà ‚Ñï,(hs2[(.g ` c0)]hs0)[(lt ` c0)]hs1)))})
  diff.hs0.w(hs3 = c0)
  diff.hs1.w(hs3 = c0)
  diff.hs2.w(hs3 = c0)
  diff.hs3.s(hs2)
  diff.hs0.s(hs2)
  diff.hs1.s(hs2)
  diff.hs3.s(hs0)
  diff.hs3.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
}

blocks.name: isinftm
blocks.content: Express ` x ` is infinitesimal with respect to ` y ` for a structure ` W ` . (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 30-Jan-2018.)
blocks.origin:
thm isinftm(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c4, c3)), wb(wbr(c2, cfv(cinftm, c0), c4), wa(wbr(c5, c6, c2), wral(s0, cn, wbr(co(cv(s0), c7, c2), c6, c4)))))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cbs, c0))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(c0g, c0))
  -| wceq(c7, cfv(cmg, c0))
  -| wceq(c6, cfv(cplt, c0))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
} = {
  3bitr4d(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c4, c3)), wbr(c2, cfv(cinftm, c0), c4), wa(wbr(c5, c6, c2), wral(s0, cn, wbr(co(cv(s0), c7, c2), c6, c4))), wbr(c2, copab(hs0, hs1, wa(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c3), wcel(cv(hs1), c3)), wa(wbr(c5, c6, cv(hs0)), wral(s0, cn, wbr(co(cv(s0), c7, cv(hs0)), c6, cv(hs1)))))), c4), wa(wa(wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c4, c3)), wa(wbr(c5, c6, c2), wral(s0, cn, wbr(co(cv(s0), c7, c2), c6, c4)))))
  3adant1(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c4, c3), wb(wbr(c2, copab(hs0, hs1, wa(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c3), wcel(cv(hs1), c3)), wa(wbr(c5, c6, cv(hs0)), wral(s0, cn, wbr(co(cv(s0), c7, cv(hs0)), c6, cv(hs1)))))), c4), wa(wa(wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c4, c3)), wa(wbr(c5, c6, c2), wral(s0, cn, wbr(co(cv(s0), c7, c2), c6, c4))))))
  brabga(hs0, hs1, c2, c3, c4, c3, copab(hs0, hs1, wa(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c3), wcel(cv(hs1), c3)), wa(wbr(c5, c6, cv(hs0)), wral(s0, cn, wbr(co(cv(s0), c7, cv(hs0)), c6, cv(hs1)))))), wa(wa(wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c4, c3)), wa(wbr(c5, c6, c2), wral(s0, cn, wbr(co(cv(s0), c7, c2), c6, c4)))), wa(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c3), wcel(cv(hs1), c3)), wa(wbr(c5, c6, cv(hs0)), wral(s0, cn, wbr(co(cv(s0), c7, cv(hs0)), c6, cv(hs1))))))
  anbi12d(wa(wceq(cv(hs0), c2), wceq(cv(hs1), c4)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c3), wcel(cv(hs1), c3)), wa(wbr(c5, c6, cv(hs0)), wral(s0, cn, wbr(co(cv(s0), c7, cv(hs0)), c6, cv(hs1)))), wa(wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c4, c3)), wa(wbr(c5, c6, c2), wral(s0, cn, wbr(co(cv(s0), c7, c2), c6, c4))))
  bi2anan9(wceq(cv(hs0), c2), wceq(cv(hs1), c4), wcel(cv(hs0), c3), wcel(cv(hs1), c3), wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c4, c3))
  eleq1(cv(hs0), c2, c3)
  eleq1(cv(hs1), c4, c3)
  anbi12d(wa(wceq(cv(hs0), c2), wceq(cv(hs1), c4)), wbr(c5, c6, cv(hs0)), wral(s0, cn, wbr(co(cv(s0), c7, cv(hs0)), c6, cv(hs1))), wbr(c5, c6, c2), wral(s0, cn, wbr(co(cv(s0), c7, c2), c6, c4)))
  breq2d(c5, c6, cv(hs0), c2, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), c2), wceq(cv(hs1), c4)))
  ralbidv(s0, cn, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), c2), wceq(cv(hs1), c4)), wbr(co(cv(s0), c7, cv(hs0)), c6, cv(hs1)), wbr(co(cv(s0), c7, c2), c6, c4))
  breq12d(co(cv(s0), c7, cv(hs0)), c6, cv(hs1), co(cv(s0), c7, c2), c4, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), c2), wceq(cv(hs1), c4)))
  oveq2d(cv(s0), c7, cv(hs0), c2, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), c2), wceq(cv(hs1), c4)))
  simpl(wceq(cv(hs0), c2), wceq(cv(hs1), c4))
  simpr(wceq(cv(hs0), c2), wceq(cv(hs1), c4))
  eqid(copab(hs0, hs1, wa(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c3), wcel(cv(hs1), c3)), wa(wbr(c5, c6, cv(hs0)), wral(s0, cn, wbr(co(cv(s0), c7, cv(hs0)), c6, cv(hs1)))))))
  breqd(c2, cfv(cinftm, c0), c4, copab(hs0, hs1, wa(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c3), wcel(cv(hs1), c3)), wa(wbr(c5, c6, cv(hs0)), wral(s0, cn, wbr(co(cv(s0), c7, cv(hs0)), c6, cv(hs1)))))), w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c4, c3)))
  syl(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c4, c3)), wceq(cfv(cinftm, c0), copab(hs0, hs1, wa(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c3), wcel(cv(hs1), c3)), wa(wbr(c5, c6, cv(hs0)), wral(s0, cn, wbr(co(cv(s0), c7, cv(hs0)), c6, cv(hs1))))))), wcel(c0, universe))
  3ad2ant1(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c4, c3), wcel(c0, universe))
  elex(c0, c1)
  fvmpt(hs2, c0, universe, cinftm, copab(hs0, hs1, wa(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c3), wcel(cv(hs1), c3)), wa(wbr(c5, c6, cv(hs0)), wral(s0, cn, wbr(co(cv(s0), c7, cv(hs0)), c6, cv(hs1)))))), copab(hs0, hs1, wa(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cbs, cv(hs2))), wcel(cv(hs1), cfv(cbs, cv(hs2)))), wa(wbr(cfv(c0g, cv(hs2)), cfv(cplt, cv(hs2)), cv(hs0)), wral(s0, cn, wbr(co(cv(s0), cfv(cmg, cv(hs2)), cv(hs0)), cfv(cplt, cv(hs2)), cv(hs1)))))))
  opabbidv(hs0, hs1, wceq(cv(hs2), c0), wa(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cbs, cv(hs2))), wcel(cv(hs1), cfv(cbs, cv(hs2)))), wa(wbr(cfv(c0g, cv(hs2)), cfv(cplt, cv(hs2)), cv(hs0)), wral(s0, cn, wbr(co(cv(s0), cfv(cmg, cv(hs2)), cv(hs0)), cfv(cplt, cv(hs2)), cv(hs1))))), wa(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c3), wcel(cv(hs1), c3)), wa(wbr(c5, c6, cv(hs0)), wral(s0, cn, wbr(co(cv(s0), c7, cv(hs0)), c6, cv(hs1))))))

thm isarchi(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wb(wcel(c0, carchi), wral(s0, c2, wral(s1, c2, wn(wbr(cv(s0), c3, cv(s1)))))))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c0))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(c0g, c0))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cinftm, c0))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
} = {
  a1ii(wi(wcel(c0, c1), wb(wcel(c0, carchi), wral(s0, c2, wral(s1, c2, wn(wbr(cv(s0), c3, cv(s1))))))), wceq(c4, cfv(c0g, c0)))
  bitrd(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c0, carchi), wral(s0, c2, wral(s1, c2, wn(wbr(cv(s0), c3, cv(s1))))), wceq(cfv(cinftm, c0), emptycls))
  elab2g(hs0, c0, c1, carchi, wceq(cfv(cinftm, c0), emptycls), wceq(cfv(cinftm, cv(hs0)), emptycls))
  fveqeq2(cv(hs0), c0, cinftm, emptycls)
  df-archi(hs0)
  syl(wcel(c0, c1), wb(wceq(cfv(cinftm, c0), emptycls), wral(s0, c2, wral(s1, c2, wn(wbr(cv(s0), c3, cv(s1)))))), wss(cfv(cinftm, c0), cxp(c2, c2)))
  inftmrel(c0, c1, c2)
  syl6bbr(wss(cfv(cinftm, c0), cxp(c2, c2)), wceq(cfv(cinftm, c0), emptycls), wral(s0, c2, wral(s1, c2, wn(wbr(cv(s0), c3, cv(s1))))), wral(s0, c2, wral(s1, c2, wi(wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cfv(cinftm, c0)), wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), emptycls)))))
  syl5bbr(wss(cfv(cinftm, c0), cxp(c2, c2)), wceq(cfv(cinftm, c0), emptycls), wral(s0, c2, wral(s1, c2, wi(wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cfv(cinftm, c0)), wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), emptycls)))), wss(cfv(cinftm, c0), emptycls))
  ss0b(cfv(cinftm, c0))
  ssrel2(s0, s1, cfv(cinftm, c0), c2, c2, emptycls)
  2ralbii(s0, s1, c2, c2, wn(wbr(cv(s0), c3, cv(s1))), wi(wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cfv(cinftm, c0)), wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), emptycls)))
  bitri(wn(wbr(cv(s0), c3, cv(s1))), wi(wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cfv(cinftm, c0)), wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), emptycls)), wb(wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cfv(cinftm, c0)), wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), emptycls)))
  xchnxbir(wbr(cv(s0), c3, cv(s1)), wb(wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cfv(cinftm, c0)), wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), emptycls)), wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cfv(cinftm, c0)))
  nbn(wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cfv(cinftm, c0)), wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), emptycls))
  bitri(wbr(cv(s0), c3, cv(s1)), wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cfv(cinftm, c0)), wbr(cv(s0), cfv(cinftm, c0), cv(s1)))

blocks.name: isarchi3
blocks.content: This is the usual definition of the Archimedean property for an ordered group. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 30-Jan-2018.)

blocks.name: archirng
blocks.content: Property of Archimedean ordered groups, framing positive ` Y ` between multiples of ` X ` . (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 12-Apr-2018.)
blocks.origin:
thm archirng(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wrex(s0, cn0, wa(wbr(co(cv(s0), c0, c1), c2, c3), wbr(c3, c4, co(co(cv(s0), caddc, nat1), c0, c1)))))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(cbs, c6))
  -| wceq(c7, cfv(c0g, c6))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cplt, c6))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cple, c6))
  -| wceq(c0, cfv(cmg, c6))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c6, cogrp))

  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, c5))
  -| wi(w0, wbr(c7, c2, c1))
  -| wi(w0, wbr(c7, c2, c3))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsc(s0, c7)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  a1ii(wi(w0, wrex(s0, cn0, wa(wbr(co(cv(s0), c0, c1), c2, c3), wbr(c3, c4, co(co(cv(s0), caddc, nat1), c0, c1))))), diffsc(s0, c2))

  mpbird(w0, wrex(s0, cn0, wa(wbr(co(cv(s0), c0, c1), c2, c3), wbr(c3, c4, co(co(cv(s0), caddc, nat1), c0, c1)))), wrex(s0, cn0, wa(wn(wbr(c3, c4, co(cv(s0), c0, c1))), wbr(c3, c4, co(co(cv(s0), caddc, nat1), c0, c1)))))

  oveq1(cv(hs0), cv(s0), c0, c1)
  breq2d(c3, c4, co(cv(hs0), c0, c1), co(co(cv(s0), caddc, nat1), c0, c1), wceq(cv(hs0), co(cv(s0), caddc, nat1)))
  oveq1(cv(hs0), co(cv(s0), caddc, nat1), c0, c1)
  mtbird(w0, wbr(c3, c4, co(nat0, c0, c1)), wbr(c3, c4, c7))
  mpbid(w0, wn(wbr(c3, c4, c7)), wbr(c7, c2, c3))

  syl(w0, wcel(c7, c5), wcel(c6, cgrp))
  grpidcl(c6, c7, c5)
  tltnle(c6, c7, c5, c3, c2, c4)
  breq2d(c3, c4, co(nat0, c0, c1), c7, w0)
  syl(w0, wceq(co(nat0, c0, c1), c7), wcel(c1, c5))
  mulg0(c1, c5, c0, c7, c6)
  syl3c(w0, wrex(hs0, cn, wbr(c3, c4, co(cv(hs0), c0, c1))), wa(wcel(c1, c5), wcel(c3, c5)), wral(hs1, c5, wral(hs2, c5, wi(wbr(c7, c2, cv(hs1)), wrex(hs0, cn, wbr(cv(hs2), c4, co(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs1))))))), wbr(c7, c2, c1))
  jca(w0, wcel(c1, c5), wcel(c3, c5))

  isarchi2(hs1, hs2, hs0, c6, c5, c7, c2, c4, c0)
  rspc2v(hs1, hs2, c1, c5, c3, c5, wi(wbr(c7, c2, cv(hs1)), wrex(hs0, cn, wbr(cv(hs2), c4, co(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs1))))), wi(wbr(c7, c2, c1), wrex(hs0, cn, wbr(c3, c4, co(cv(hs0), c0, c1)))), wi(wbr(c7, c2, c1), wrex(hs0, cn, wbr(cv(hs2), c4, co(cv(hs0), c0, c1)))))
  imbi12d(wceq(cv(hs1), c1), wbr(c7, c2, cv(hs1)), wrex(hs0, cn, wbr(cv(hs2), c4, co(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs1)))), wbr(c7, c2, c1), wrex(hs0, cn, wbr(cv(hs2), c4, co(cv(hs0), c0, c1))))
  breq2(cv(hs1), c1, c7, c2)
  rexbidv(hs0, cn, wceq(cv(hs1), c1), wbr(cv(hs2), c4, co(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs1))), wbr(cv(hs2), c4, co(cv(hs0), c0, c1)))
  breq2d(cv(hs2), c4, co(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs1)), co(cv(hs0), c0, c1), wceq(cv(hs1), c1))
  oveq2(cv(hs1), c1, cv(hs0), c0)
  imbi2d(wceq(cv(hs2), c3), wbr(c7, c2, c1), wrex(hs0, cn, wbr(cv(hs2), c4, co(cv(hs0), c0, c1))), wrex(hs0, cn, wbr(c3, c4, co(cv(hs0), c0, c1))))
  rexbidv(hs0, cn, wceq(cv(hs2), c3), wbr(cv(hs2), c4, co(cv(hs0), c0, c1)), wbr(c3, c4, co(cv(hs0), c0, c1)))
  breq1(cv(hs2), c3, c4, co(cv(hs0), c0, c1))
  rexbidva(s0, cn0, w0, wa(wbr(co(cv(s0), c0, c1), c2, c3), wbr(c3, c4, co(co(cv(s0), caddc, nat1), c0, c1))), wa(wn(wbr(c3, c4, co(cv(s0), c0, c1))), wbr(c3, c4, co(co(cv(s0), caddc, nat1), c0, c1))))
  anbi1d(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cn0)), wbr(co(cv(s0), c0, c1), c2, c3), wbr(c3, c4, co(co(cv(s0), caddc, nat1), c0, c1)), wn(wbr(c3, c4, co(cv(s0), c0, c1))))
  syl3anc(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cn0)), wb(wbr(co(cv(s0), c0, c1), c2, c3), wn(wbr(c3, c4, co(cv(s0), c0, c1)))), wcel(c6, ctos), wcel(co(cv(s0), c0, c1), c5), wcel(c3, c5))
  adantr(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cn0), wcel(c6, ctos))
  3syl(w0, wcel(c6, ctos), wcel(c6, cogrp), wcel(c6, comnd))
  simprbi(wcel(c6, cogrp), wcel(c6, comnd), wcel(c6, cgrp))
  isogrp(c6)
  omndtos(c6)
  syl3anc(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cn0)), wcel(co(cv(s0), c0, c1), c5), wcel(c6, cgrp), wcel(cv(s0), cz), wcel(c1, c5))
  adantr(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cn0), wcel(c6, cgrp))
  syl(w0, wcel(c6, cgrp), wcel(c6, cogrp))

blocks.name: archiexdiv
blocks.content: In an Archimedean group, given two positive elements, there exists a "divisor" ` n ` . (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 30-Jan-2018.)

thm archiexdiv(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6) {
  |- wi(w3a(wa(wcel(c0, cogrp), wcel(c0, carchi)), wa(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)), wbr(c4, c5, c1)), wrex(s0, cn, wbr(c3, c5, co(cv(s0), c6, c1))))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c0))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(c0g, c0))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(cplt, c0))
  -| wceq(c6, cfv(cmg, c0))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsc(s0, c5)
  -| diffsc(s0, c6)
} = {
  mp2d(w3a(wa(wcel(c0, cogrp), wcel(c0, carchi)), wa(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)), wbr(c4, c5, c1)), wrex(s0, cn, wbr(c3, c5, co(cv(s0), c6, c1))), wral(hs0, c2, wral(hs1, c2, wi(wbr(c4, c5, cv(hs0)), wrex(s0, cn, wbr(cv(hs1), c5, co(cv(s0), c6, cv(hs0))))))), wbr(c4, c5, c1))
  3ad2ant1(wa(wcel(c0, cogrp), wcel(c0, carchi)), wa(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)), wbr(c4, c5, c1), wral(hs0, c2, wral(hs1, c2, wi(wbr(c4, c5, cv(hs0)), wrex(s0, cn, wbr(cv(hs1), c5, co(cv(s0), c6, cv(hs0))))))))
  biimpa(wcel(c0, cogrp), wcel(c0, carchi), wral(hs0, c2, wral(hs1, c2, wi(wbr(c4, c5, cv(hs0)), wrex(s0, cn, wbr(cv(hs1), c5, co(cv(s0), c6, cv(hs0))))))))
  isarchi3(hs0, hs1, s0, c0, c2, c4, c5, c6)
  simp3(wa(wcel(c0, cogrp), wcel(c0, carchi)), wa(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)), wbr(c4, c5, c1))
  3ad2ant2(wa(wcel(c0, cogrp), wcel(c0, carchi)), wa(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)), wbr(c4, c5, c1), wi(wral(hs0, c2, wral(hs1, c2, wi(wbr(c4, c5, cv(hs0)), wrex(s0, cn, wbr(cv(hs1), c5, co(cv(s0), c6, cv(hs0))))))), wi(wbr(c4, c5, c1), wrex(s0, cn, wbr(c3, c5, co(cv(s0), c6, c1))))))
  rspc2v(hs0, hs1, c1, c2, c3, c2, wi(wbr(c4, c5, cv(hs0)), wrex(s0, cn, wbr(cv(hs1), c5, co(cv(s0), c6, cv(hs0))))), wi(wbr(c4, c5, c1), wrex(s0, cn, wbr(c3, c5, co(cv(s0), c6, c1)))), wi(wbr(c4, c5, c1), wrex(s0, cn, wbr(cv(hs1), c5, co(cv(s0), c6, c1)))))
  imbi12d(wceq(cv(hs0), c1), wbr(c4, c5, cv(hs0)), wrex(s0, cn, wbr(cv(hs1), c5, co(cv(s0), c6, cv(hs0)))), wbr(c4, c5, c1), wrex(s0, cn, wbr(cv(hs1), c5, co(cv(s0), c6, c1))))
  breq2(cv(hs0), c1, c4, c5)
  rexbidv(s0, cn, wceq(cv(hs0), c1), wbr(cv(hs1), c5, co(cv(s0), c6, cv(hs0))), wbr(cv(hs1), c5, co(cv(s0), c6, c1)))
  breq2d(cv(hs1), c5, co(cv(s0), c6, cv(hs0)), co(cv(s0), c6, c1), wceq(cv(hs0), c1))
  oveq2(cv(hs0), c1, cv(s0), c6)
  imbi2d(wceq(cv(hs1), c3), wbr(c4, c5, c1), wrex(s0, cn, wbr(cv(hs1), c5, co(cv(s0), c6, c1))), wrex(s0, cn, wbr(c3, c5, co(cv(s0), c6, c1))))

  diff.hs1.w(wi(wbr(c4, c5, c1), wrex(s0, cn, wbr(c3, c5, co(cv(s0), c6, c1)))))

thm archiexdiv(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6) {
  ‚ä¢ (((c0 ‚àà oGrp ‚àß c0 ‚àà Archi)‚àß(c1 ‚àà c2 ‚àß c3 ‚àà c2)‚àß c4[c5]c1)‚Üí ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà ‚Ñï, c3[c5](s0[c6]c1)))
  ‚ä£ c2 =(Base ` c0)

  ‚ä£ c6 =(.g ` c0)

  ‚ä£ d(s0, c3)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c4)

  ‚ä£ d(s0, c6)
} = {
  mp2d(((c0 ‚àà oGrp ‚àß c0 ‚àà Archi)‚àß(c1 ‚àà c2 ‚àß c3 ‚àà c2)‚àß c4[c5]c1), ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà ‚Ñï, c3[c5](s0[c6]c1)), ‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà c2, ‚àÄ(hs1 ‚àà c2,(c4[c5]hs0 ‚Üí ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà ‚Ñï, hs1[c5](s0[c6]hs0))))), c4[c5]c1)
  3ad2ant1((c0 ‚àà oGrp ‚àß c0 ‚àà Archi), (c1 ‚àà c2 ‚àß c3 ‚àà c2), c4[c5]c1, ‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà c2, ‚àÄ(hs1 ‚àà c2,(c4[c5]hs0 ‚Üí ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà ‚Ñï, hs1[c5](s0[c6]hs0))))))

  simp3((c0 ‚àà oGrp ‚àß c0 ‚àà Archi), (c1 ‚àà c2 ‚àß c3 ‚àà c2), c4[c5]c1)
  3ad2ant2((c0 ‚àà oGrp ‚àß c0 ‚àà Archi), (c1 ‚àà c2 ‚àß c3 ‚àà c2), c4[c5]c1, (‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà c2, ‚àÄ(hs1 ‚àà c2,(c4[c5]hs0 ‚Üí ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà ‚Ñï, hs1[c5](s0[c6]hs0)))))‚Üí(c4[c5]c1 ‚Üí ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà ‚Ñï, c3[c5](s0[c6]c1)))))
  rspc2v(hs0, hs1, c1, c2, c3, c2, (c4[c5]hs0 ‚Üí ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà ‚Ñï, hs1[c5](s0[c6]hs0))), (c4[c5]c1 ‚Üí ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà ‚Ñï, c3[c5](s0[c6]c1))), (c4[c5]c1 ‚Üí ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà ‚Ñï, hs1[c5](s0[c6]c1))))
  imbi12d(hs0 = c1, c4[c5]hs0, ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà ‚Ñï, hs1[c5](s0[c6]hs0)), c4[c5]c1, ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà ‚Ñï, hs1[c5](s0[c6]c1)))
  breq2(hs0, c1, c4, c5)
  rexbidv(s0, cn, hs0 = c1, hs1[c5](s0[c6]hs0), hs1[c5](s0[c6]c1))
  breq2d(hs1, c5, (s0[c6]hs0), (s0[c6]c1), hs0 = c1)
  oveq2(hs0, c1, s0, c6)
  imbi2d(hs1 = c3, c4[c5]c1, ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà ‚Ñï, hs1[c5](s0[c6]c1)), ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà ‚Ñï, c3[c5](s0[c6]c1)))

blocks.name: archiabllem1a
blocks.content: Lemma for ~ archiabl : In case an archimedean group ` W ` admits a smallest positive element ` U ` , then any positive element ` X ` of ` W ` can be written as ` ( n .x. U ) ` with ` n e. NN ` . Since the reciprocal holds for negative elements, ` W ` is then isomorphic to ` ZZ ` . (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 12-Apr-2018.)

blocks.name: archiabllem1
blocks.content: Archimedean ordered groups with a minimal positive value are abelian. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 13-Apr-2018.)

blocks.name: archiabllem2a
blocks.content: Lemma for ~ archiabl , which requires the group to be both left- and right-ordered. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 13-Apr-2018.)
